sentences.english: The hunchback in the corner by the wall exulted.
sentences.chinese: 壁角的驼背忽然高兴起来。

sentences.english: Such sigh absolutly come from no excuse. such as suddenly thought of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 若干感慨，简直无来由，比如忽然想到生死。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 终于，马啸指向本人的手枪忽然翻转，指向刀锋。

sentences.english: If the scourge slay suddenly, he will laugh at the trial of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 若忽然遭杀害之祸，他必戏笑无辜的人遇难。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I felt the fall of the quiet, Jingde only the lonely.
sentences.chinese: 忽然间我感到了秋的静，静得只剩下了寂寞。

sentences.english: One day during the migration in the street, suddenly heard someone make open challenges to fights.
sentences.chinese: 李世民一日在街上游走，忽然听到有人在摆擂台。

sentences.english: I am about to give you slide show when outlet is pulled.
sentences.chinese: 一节课我就要给出幻灯时，忽然插被拉下。

sentences.english: The dog cocked its ears suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗忽然把耳朵竖起来。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the distant and melancholy vibration of a clock shook the panes.
sentences.chinese: 令人怅惘的钟声忽然从远处传来，震撼着窗上的玻璃。

sentences.english: Suddenly the father put down a bowl chopsticks, son some surprise gain ground.
sentences.chinese: 忽然父亲放下碗筷，儿女有些惊喜地抬头。

sentences.english: In the midst of this, a sudden sense of omniscience dawned on me.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时候，我忽然有了一种全知的感觉。

sentences.english: Suddenly, , something like lotus-gathering crosses my mind.
sentences.chinese: 忽然想起采莲的事情来了。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the music of the piano disappears, then wail appears.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，琴声消失了，凄厉的哭声又跟著出现。

sentences.english: And suddenly the only solution that made sense for her. Escape.
sentences.chinese: 忽然间对她来说，唯一合理的解决办法就是，逃跑。

sentences.english: Liu Mei discovered when suddenly want to back to chop wood field who drains.
sentences.chinese: 陆梅忽然想开初到砍木场时发现的阿谁下水口。

definition: to be just about to/to be on the point of
a burst/a fit/a peal/a spell (period of time)
